titles.title: My Lord Knows The Way Through The Wilderness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My Lord knows the way through the wilderness.
All I have to do is follow.
My Lord knows the way through the wilderness.
All I have to do is follow.
Strength for today, is mine all the way,
And all I need for tomorrow.
My Lord knows the way through the wilderness.
All I have to do is follow.
